name: SocketPort
desc: A port that represents a BSD socket.

items.name: address
items.desc: The receiver’s socket address structure stored inside an NSData object.

items.name: protocol
items.desc: The protocol that the receiver uses for communication.

items.name: protocolFamily
items.desc: The protocol family that the receiver uses for communication.

items.name: socket
items.desc: The receiver’s native socket identifier on the platform.
